name: Dragoon Project
description:
Exclusive debut for the iOS! DrgnSoft's first title!

The Dragoon Project is an arcade style bullet hell game that takes full advantage of touch screen controls. Inspired by old-school arcade games, hardcore gamers will feel at home with this modern incarnation.

Reign as the strongest! As the representative of the latest arms development, you must prove that the Dragoon Units can overcome the mainstay Imperial Arms, the Dreadnaughts.

Featuring:

- Free content updates
- Glorious pixel art (GLORIOUS)
- Craft over 90 different weapons and equipment
- Includes Game Center achievements, leaderboards, and iCloud support
- 30 different maps with over 300 rooms
- EX Levels for insane challenge
- Bonus modes: Boss Rush and Unlimited Mode
